Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about our services

How do I join the DP growth plan?

You can join by registering on our membership page with a fee of Rs.1500/- and start building your team.

What are the payment methods available?

We accept bank transfers, UPI payments, PhonePe, Google Pay, and cash deposits.

How long does it take to process membership?

Membership is usually processed within 24-48 hours after successful payment verification.

Can I contact support for help?

Yes, our support team is available 24/7 via phone, email, and the contact form on this page.
